itemInfo.itemName: Ancient Magic Crystal of Nature - Adamantine
itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Shoe sockets.
- Item Effect: Knockdown Resistance & Bound Resistance +25%

※ This magic crystal has a low chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Red Battlefield Crystal: Adamantine
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Shoes sockets. 
- Item effect: Knockdown/Bound Resistance +25% & Faint/Rigidity/Freezing Resistance +5%
※ Once installed, the crystal might be destroyed upon the character's death.
- The potential of the crystal can be transfused to equipment items through Black Spirit.
- How to Obtain: Enter the Red Battlefield through Black Spirit and earn Red Seals through a fierce battle.
Exchange the Red Seals with Red Essence from Ornella in Heidel.
Heat the Red Essence and Ancient Magic Crystal: Adamantine together.
